participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and introverted, often lost in thought.
participant_1.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and practical, always ready to lend a hand.
participant_2.background: my wife and kids are the best. i am a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife. i have three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.
